name: Moray Flying Club
about: Moray Flying Club, located on the picturesque shores of the Moray Firth in Forres, Scotland, is a not-for-profit flying club primarily serving military personnel from RAF Kinloss and RAF Lossiemouth. The club offers cost-effective flying training, including tuition for the UK Part-FCL Private Pilots Licence (PPL) and the Light Aircraft Pilots Licence (LAPL). With a focus on affordability and quality instruction, Moray Flying Club provides airplane flight training in a supportive and professional environment. The club is dedicated to making flying accessible to both military personnel and select civilians, ensuring a comprehensive and enjoyable learning experience.
